name: vientos cabled hat
notes:
vientos is a soft, superwash yarn that is perfect for hat knitting.  this hat was modeled after the noventa hat pattern and is a great way to learn cables.

materials: 1 skein malabrigo vientos. vientos, 130 yards per 100g skein, 100% superwash wool.  hand wash, dry flat.
needles:  16” us #9 and us #10 and 32” us #10 for magic loop.
cable needle, stitch marker, removable stitch marker, and tapestry needle.

this is a free pattern and my way of giving back to our community.   please purchase your yarn from [the yarn club][1] or your favorite lys.


  [1]: https://yarnclubknits.com/collections/bulky/products/vientos
